page.title: 04NESS SIDE HOUSE
page.content: The original mansion house was built in 1883 by Mackintosh of Holme but the present one was built by Joseph Godman in 1960. { NESS SIDE COTTAGE}is a ghillie's house. We saw five one_week_old mallard ducklings being looked after by a black hen. Their mother deserted the eggs and the hen hatched them. When the ducklings return to the River Ness the hen cannot follow them. { MILTON OF NESS SIDE}is 250 years old and has been renovated. At{NESS SIDE FARM}we saw 2 stones and a tree which are boundary lines for fishing. Also near the farm is a hut where deer used to be chilled. It belonged to the Red Deer Commission.
